name: I/O Extended 2017
description: Google I/O showcases technical in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open sources such as Android, Chrome and Chrome OS, APIs, Google Web Toolkit, App Engine, and more. It is an event that aims to bring local tech community together to experience talks, in-depth product demos and behind-the-scenes interviews. The participants such as software developers, cloud professionals and tech enthusiasts and many more will watch the opening keynote of the Google I/O and discuss around the presented technologies.

name: IOT - The Practical Approach.

venue.name: hapaspace Co-working space
venue.address_1: DOVEWELL (THE VILLAGE) BUILDING - ADUM. OPPOSITE STC. ADJACENT TO UT BANK -ADUM BRANCH FROM KMA, KUMASI

description: IoT the Practical Approach event will be technical session which will focus on the devices and the way internet of things operates in our everyday life. It is an event that aims to bring local tech community together to experience talks and in-depth practical. The participants such as software developers, iot developers and tech enthusiasts and many more will be at the event to learn and share ideas on how to integrate IoT in everyday life.

name: DevFest 2017 Ext.
description:
• What we'll do
GDG Ghana is pleased to announce #DevFest17. Its that season that brings together developers from all walks of life, giving them a chance to showcase what they have been up to this year.

in collaboration with KsTU we bring to you DevFest Extended 2017

• What innovation are you working on?

• What's new in your area of influence?

• How different are you using old tech to make new art!

Mother Ghana is on the verge of a #techsplosion, are you there with Her? #gpsthings #$2.5 #Jack #Devfest17 #whereareyou #paperless #biometric

Come 25th November 10am.

All roads will lead to KsTU. B-TECH building, Lab 3.

Tip of the Iceburg

• Snacks/Networking

• SWAGS

Sponsors:

Google | KsTU
#DevFest

• What to bring
Come with a laptop if possible

• Important to know
Are you a Developer, software engineer, a techpreneur, an entrepreneur, innovator or a change maker ? Then this is for you. Absolutely Free

name: Mobile Site Study Jams 2018

venue.name: University of Education Winneba, Kumasi Campus
venue.address_1: Tanoso, Off Kumasi to Sunyani Road

description:
• What we'll do
This is a four hour study jam that prepares participants to take the Mobile Sites Certification Exam. The Mobile Sites certification is a professional accreditation that Google offers to individuals who demonstrate proficiency in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development. A Mobile Sites certification allows individuals to demonstrate that Google recognises them as an expert in mobile sites.
There is more traffic to mobile sites than desktop yet most sites don’t provide an effective experience for users. Best practice is changing rapidly so what people may have learned a few years ago may not be up to date
53% of mobile visitors will leave if a page takes more than three seconds to load. The
average page takes 22 seconds to load, so collectively we're losing a lot of mobile users
and giving them a bad experience along the way. Speed is only one part of the picture when
creating great mobile experiences.
Join us lets learn more on creating better user experience on mobile web

Register Now!

GDG Kumasi Team

• What to bring
Laptop

• Important to know
You need to have basic knowledge about HTML, CSS and JAVASCRIPT
how_to_find_us: University of Education, Winneba - Kumasi Campu. Tanoso

name: TensorFlow Dev Summit 2018 + Machine Learning Crash Course

venue.name: hapaspace Co-working space
venue.address_1: DOVEWELL (THE VILLAGE) BUILDING - ADUM. OPPOSITE STC. ADJACENT TO UT BANK -ADUM BRANCH FROM KMA, KUMASI

description:
TensorFlow Dev Summit brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from all walks of life around the world to participate in highly technical talks, demos, and conversation about TensorFlow and machine learning.
This event brings to participants TensorFLow Summit 2018 extended and also gets them up and running with machine learning with TensorFlow APIs
What to Expect
*Streaming of key notes from TensorFlow Dev Summit 2018
*Practical Codelab Session with our machine learning experts!

Come with a Laptop!

Register via this link:
https://goo.gl/E8Y1Js

#GDGKUMASI
